name: safe
description:
Note that screencaps directly from the show, without edits and with only reasonable animation loops, are _always_ safe.
*Images tagged safe cannot have any other rating.*
short_description: Entirely safe for work and children.

name: solo
description: This tag is to be used when there is only one character shown in the image.
short_description: Image with only one character

name: oc
description: Tag for any character that has not appeared in official media or merchandise; that is, a fan-made character, regardless of how popular they may be.

name: oc only
description: There are no characters from the show, comics, toys or other official media in the image.
short_description: Image only has Original characters

name: clothes
description: Do not use this tag when the clothes in question are being worn by a character as they normally appear, such as Granny Smith's kerchief or Mayor Mare's collar, unless other articles of clothing are present.
short_description: Non-standard clothes

name: explicit
description:
The explicit tag is for sexually explicit images. This includes:
-> Nudity showing the genitals (this includes the labia, but not sheaths, and applies to clothing that may as well be painted on) or a detailed anus (e.g. one showing depth or coloration)
-> Sexual contact with genitals or anuses (even if not directly visible)
-> Non-urine genital fluids
short_description: Explicit sexual content – visible genitals or anuses, sex, cum, etc.

name: simple background
description:
Don't use with gradient backgrounds or anything of more than one color.
>>285886t
short_description: A simple background of one solid color or complete transparency.

name: anthro
description:
Anthros are bipedal versions of four-legged creatures or characters and may have all hooves or hooves and hands or hands and feet, depending on the style of the individual artist. Anthros generally have tails and muzzles. Also boobs.

Example
>>429972t
short_description: A character with semi-human but not fully human anatomy

name: shipping
description:
Images with implication that a character is in love with another, between any gender, age or race, or even two of the same character. Usually accompanied by lovey-dovey things such as kissing, blushing, hugging, snuggling, nuzzling or sexual acts, though both characters don't have to be present in the image.

Example
>>481695t
short_description: Images with romance, consensual sex, or either implied. ie: Don't use it for rape, you fucking bellend.

name: solo female
description:
A single female presented in a provocative or sexual manner. This tag does not apply to 'safe' rating images, please just use 'solo' for those.

Example
>>467158t
short_description: A single female presented in a provocative or sexual manner

name: monochrome
description:
Images that are predominantly in one color, which does not necessarily mean grayscale.

Related tags: "grayscale":/tags/grayscale, "black and white":/tags/black+and+white.
short_description: One colour.

name: equestria girls
description: For images either directly related to the Equestria Girls series of movies, or characters drawn in an Equestria Girls style. Images that do not have a direct corrispondence to Equestria Girls (such as ponified Sunset Shimmer or Dazzlings) should not be tagged with this tag. Use "equestria girls ==(movie)==":https://derpibooru.org/tags/equestria+girls+%28movie%29 for images directly referencing the first movie.
short_description: For images directly related to the Equestria Girls franchise as a whole.

name: screencap
description:
Also tag the title of the episode, movie, or short (if known) for official works or major fan productions.
If edited, tag as "Edited Screencap.":https://derpibooru.org/tags/edited+screencap
Not to be used for images of websites, tweets, news articles, etc.
short_description: Still images or animations from pony-related videos

name: transparent background
description:
Used for posts with a transparent background, commonly found in vector and pixel art.

Related: "simple background":/tags/simple+background

>>581254t
short_description: A transparent background.

name: human
description: For non-human characters drawn as a human, add the "humanized.":/tags/humanized tag.
short_description: A bunch of hairless apes.

name: questionable
description:
A mostly comprehensive list of questionable things:
->Visible breast nipples
->Overt sexual references
->Barely-covered genitals or anuses
->Visible genital/anal outlines (not super-detailed) through clothing
->Pubic hair
->Simplistic anuses (e.g. just an X or an outline for an anus)
->Penis sheaths (i.e. skin for the penis to slide out of such as on a dog or horse)
->Sexual rubbing or licking on sensitive areas, but not on the genitals or anus
->Sloppy makeouts
->Presence of (but not use of) sex toys
->Objects used to represent genitals
->Major overt fetish scenarios (e.g. inflation, diaper)
short_description: NSFW stuff that doesn't go all the way to explicit, like non-explicit sexual contact, sex jokes, exposed breasts, non-explicit nudity etc.

name: suggestive
description:
A list of suggestive things:
-> Non-overt sexual references
-> Sexy poses
-> Skimpy outfits
-> Makeouts, but not sloppy ones
-> Minor fetish scenarios (e.g. tickle torture)
short_description: Sexually suggestive (tame and non-overt sexual stuff)

name: humanized
description:
A non-human character drawn as a human. May include a tail, wings, pony ears, or a horn. For humanized art with tails, wings, pony ears, or horns include also the tags "tailed humanization":/tags/tailed+humanization, "winged humanization":/tags/winged+humanization, "eared humanization":/tags/eared+humanization, or "horned humanization":/tags/horned+humanization, respectively. This tag applies to images of characters that are unquestionably human. Characters who do not closely resemble a human, or have too many non-human characteristics, should be tagged "anthro":/tags/anthro instead.

Example
>>7830t
short_description: A non-human character drawn as a human

name: traditional art
description: Tag used for images drawn mostly with traditional (i.e. non-digital) tools, like pencils, pens, crayons, markers, charcoal, watercolour, etc.
short_description: Images drawn with non-digital tools

name: meme
description: In other words, usually following a pattern of some sort. Not necessarily on the image itself; for that see "exploitable meme.":/tags/exploitable+meme
short_description: A joke or concept often repeated

name: nipples
short_description: "The projection on the breasts or udder of a mammal by which breast milk is delivered to a mother's young". Note that the presence of nipples on breasts causes an image to be at least questionable.

name: sex
description: This tag and any of the tags "aftersex":/tags/aftersex, "imminent sex":/tags/imminent+sex or "implied sex":/tags/implied+sex *cannot* be on the same image, except in cases of an image containing more than one depiction of the same characters. Sex is being performed if and only if genitals are in contact or a mouth is touching a genital.
short_description: Sexual contact with genitals or anuses (even if not directly visible)

name: photo
short_description: Both photos of real-life subjects and in-fiction photos of fictional subjects.

name: vulva
description: External parts of female genitalia. Normally visible. (If the interior is visible, tag "vagina":https://derpibooru.org/tags/vagina instead.)
short_description: External parts of female genitalia.

name: vector
description:
True vector images scale infinitely in size with no loss in quality because they are made up of coordinates that represent lines and shapes with color fills assigned. Derpibooru generates .PNG previews of .SVG vectors that are submitted, but keeps the original .SVG available for download.

If the submission is a .SVG, or if the artist has made a .SVG or .AI file available, please also tag ".SVG available":/tags/-dot-svg+available or ".AI available":/tags/-dot-ai+available.

Please tag "Transparent Background":/tags/transparent+background if the background of the vector is partly or wholly transparent.
short_description: Art made with a vector-based drawing program (typically Adobe Illustrator or Inkscape), as opposed to a raster-based program

name: anus
short_description: Butthole. Causes an image to be explicit, unless very simplistic.

name: edit
description: Use this tag ONLY when it is someone other than the original artist altering the image. Use "@alternate version@":/tags/alternate+version if it is the original artist making the changes.
short_description: Edits to images done by third parties. NOT for changes made by the original artist.

name: plot
description:
A fandom-related term, this tag defines _*non-anthropomorphic*_ pony butts. This also applies to _non-anthropomorphic horses_ as well.
_Human, anthro, and non-pony butts should ideally be tagged with "*ass*":/tags/ass instead._

>>9512t
short_description: Non-Anthro Pony Butts

name: vagina
description: Internal parts of female genitalia. Normally not visible (tag that "vulva":https://derpibooru.org/tags/vulva instead) unless the labia is spread or there is an internal view/x-ray.
short_description: Internal parts of female genitalia.

name: crossover
short_description: When elements from another media universe are combined with MLP elements

name: trixie
description:
Savior of Equestria, past wielder of the Alicorn Amulet, member of the Resistance in an alternate timeline, creatrix of the Teacup Poodle, currently the only pony able to perform the incredibly dangerous and amazing "Moonshot Manticore Mouth Dive", and rumored to be the most magical unicorn in all of Equestria.
>>1358464s >>371616s
short_description: Best Pony

name: irl
short_description: "In Real Life" - photos of real people, places, or things.

name: balls
short_description: Also known as testicles

name: absurd res
description: Images with a resolution of 16 Megapixels (4000×4000px) or greater. Images _smaller_ than 4000×4000px but _larger_ than 2000×2000px should be tagged with "high res":/tags/high+res instead.
short_description: Images with a resolution of 4000×4000px or greater.

name: bedroom eyes
short_description: Eyes partially closed in a seductive manner.

name: horsecock
description:
An animalistic horse penis present in an image. While commonly seen on ponies and anthros, they may also appear on non-equines and humans, depending on the artist in question.

See also:
• "anatomically correct":/tags/anatomically+correct (horse vagina)
• "human penis":/tags/human+penis (self-explanatory)
short_description: One or multiple horse penises.

name: exploitable meme
description: Tag used for meme images that follow a premade template or convention, and are mostly made via copy-pasting two images together or adding some text to an image.
short_description: Meme images with low original artistic content

name: white background
description:
Do not use when the image is a scan or photo with a white background, like this:
>>969049t
short_description: Image has pure white background fill.

name: grimdark
description: Note that images with a lighter tone, such as dark comedy, should be semi-grimdark.
short_description: Stuff with a very dark tone, including torture, abuse, death, rape, mind loss, axe-murdering insanity, tyrannical dictatorships etc.

name: ponified
short_description: An originally non-pony character drawn as a pony.

name: futa
short_description: Beings with feminine characteristics and penises, including hermaphrodites

name: food
short_description: Anything edible.

name: filly
short_description: Young female pony

name: dialogue
description:
For images with speech bubbles, or other such writing indicating characters talking.

Images with generic non-speech or otherwise general text should be tagged with "text":/tags/text instead.

name: text
description:
The bulk or meaning of these images (e.g. screenshots of Twitter posts) lies in words. This does not exclude other tags - if it's a story about people having sex, it's also explicit; if it's a story about abusing a fluffy pony, it's grimdark and possibly also grotesque and gore if there's a lot of detail in that direction. Note that grimdark material about fluffy ponies should also be tagged "fluffy pony grimdark".

Tag images with speech bubbles (such as comics), or other such writing indicating characters talking with "dialogue":/tags/dialogue instead.
short_description: More wordy than artistic

name: unguligrade anthro
short_description: Anthros with pony legs

name: heart
description:
A heart drawn in a picture to show love or desire.

Example
>>343249t

For the organ, use the tag "heart ==(organ)==":/tags/heart+%28organ%29

name: ass
description:
This tag applies to butts. It's very self-explanatory, really.
_*Non-anthro pony (and horse) butts* in particular should be tagged with "*plot*":/tags/plot instead._
short_description: Human, anthro, and non-pony butts.

name: cosplay
short_description: An IRL human dressed up as a character, or a character dressed up as another character

name: dock
description: The visible underside of a pony's tail where hair does not grow. Usually seen in rear views or with raised tails.
short_description: The underside of a pony's tail where hair does not grow.

name: ponut
description:
A slang term coined early on in the fandom; assumed to be short for "pony donut". In context, it is used to describe "anatomically correct":/tags/anatomically+correct anuses on both feral and anthro pony characters.

In contrast with the word's origins, they are not necessarily edible. Usually.
short_description: Pony Donut

name: bipedal
description:
A pony standing on their hind legs as if they were a two-legged creature. Does not apply to anthro or humanized art.

Example
>>481395t
short_description: A pony standing on two legs

name: mane six
description:
Tag used for images that show all of the main six ponies together. "Mane" is used because horse joke.

Related tag "Mane Seven":/tags/mane+seven covers the main six characters plus Spike.
short_description: For images that show all main six characters
implied_tags: applejack, fluttershy, pinkie pie, rainbow dash, rarity, twilight sparkle

name: bat pony
description: A pony race characterized by bat wings, slit pupils and fuzzier ear tips. Canon example are Luna's "Night Guard":/tags/night+guard, and also applied to "Flutterbat":/tags/flutterbat.
short_description: Pony race with bat wings and slit pupils

name: artist needed
short_description: Use for tagging images with an unknown artist. Do not use together with "anonymous artist", which implies a desire to remain unknown.

name: bondage
short_description: A character being restrained. Whether by ropes, chains, tape, magic, or some other method that restricts the character's movement.

name: vaginal
description: Used when any character in the image is penetrated vaginally by a penis or a tentacle (something other than a toy). See "vaginal insertion":/tags/vaginal+insertion for use of a toy.
short_description: Vaginal sex.

name: semi-grimdark
description:
For images that are mildly dark but not crushingly depressing or horrifying. Examples:
-> Mild injuries
-> Insane or mentally perturbed (but not full on MURDER MODE)
-> Dark themes without heavy imagery
short_description: For images that are mildly dark but not crushingly depressing or horrifying.

name: grayscale
description:
Images that are exclusively in shades of gray, ranging from black at the darkest to white at the brightest.

Related tags: "monochrome":/tags/monochrome, "black and white":/tags/black+and+white.
short_description: Just gray.

name: stockings
description: Refers to legware. For Christmas stockings, please see "stocking":/tags/stocking

name: anal
description: Used when any character in the image is penetrated anally by a penis or a tentacle (something other than a toy). See "anal insertion":/tags/anal+insertion for use of a toy.
short_description: Anal sex

name: source filmmaker
description: A tool designed to create three dimensional animations and pictures.

name: toy
description: *Do not use for sex toys.* They have their own tags.
short_description: Photos of actual pony-related toys or artwork containing toys.

name: edited screencap
description: Typically it's been modified to add text and/or to make a joke. Do not use for screencaps that have simply been cropped.
short_description: A screencap that has had its content edited.

name: solo male
description:
A single male presented in a provocative or sexual manner. This tag does not apply to 'safe' rating images, please just use 'solo' for those.


Example
>>247064t
short_description: A single male presented in a provocative or sexual manner

name: portrait
description:
An image primarily of the face of a character, no lower than the upper shoulders.

>>453164t
short_description: Above the shoulders.

name: plantigrade anthro
short_description: Anthros with human legs

name: plushie
short_description: Actual physical plush toys as well as artwork of plush toys.

name: wallpaper
description: Wallpaper-sized images can also be found by using "aspect_ratio":/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&sbq=aspect_ratio%3A1.7~0.1 or "width and height.":/search?utf8=✓&sbq=width%3A1920%2C+height%3A1080
short_description: Sized for use as a computer or phone desktop background/wallpaper

name: pixiv
short_description: The highly improved Japanese version of Deviant Art

name: wat
description:
Either intentionally or not, the image has confusing or surprising elements and leaves most viewers saying "what?".

Related tags: "not salmon":/tags/not+salmon
short_description: A picture that gets confused reactions

name: foalcon
description: Underage for our purposes means "pubescent or prepubescent". Jailbait does not count as foalcon, but still runs afoul of the loli/shota rules.
short_description: For images of underage characters, including Spike, in a sexual context. Loli/shotacon is banned. Does not belong on safe images.

name: presenting
short_description: A sexual pose wherein the rear is positioned to allow easy access for sexual activity.

name: wings
short_description: Specialized limbs used for flying or gliding.

name: meta
description:
The meta tag is for things which are more to do with the site or fandom than the show itself. Meta images include:
-> Screencaps of internet sites, like news articles, deviant art discussions, or *chan threads
-> Images which are actually a big block of text where you soapbox about something and should probably be on a forum, not an imageboard
-> Images about the OCs of people on the site or anything like that
short_description: Stuff that's specifically to do with the site or the fandom rather than the show itself

name: duo
description: For when there are only two characters featured in a picture in a non-shipping situation.
short_description: Only two characters in a picture that isn’t shipping

name: interspecies
short_description: A romantic or explicit relationship between characters that are different species.

name: canon x oc
description:
An original character shown or implied to be in a relationship with or engaging in sexual acts with a canon character.
>>1073269t
short_description: An original character shipped or engaging in sexual acts with a canon character

name: wink
description: Not the other kind.
short_description: Winking one eye.

name: older
description: Used on images that show grown up characters (over 18) that are canonically underage (those within the MLP:FIM universe).

name: original species
description:
Fan made characters not of in-show species such as earth pony, pegasus, unicorn, donkey, griffon, etc
This tag does not include characters belonging to other shows.
short_description: Fan made characters not of in-show species

name: chest fluff
description:
Visible tuft of fur on a character's chest.

*[Example]*
>>1346977t
short_description: Visible tuft of chest fur.

name: anatomically correct
description:
An animalistic horse vagina present in an image. Usually only seen on ponies and other non-anthro horse characters, and not as common on anthro or non-horse characters.

See also: "horsecock":/tags/horsecock
short_description: Accurate horse vagina.

name: ahegao
description: A facial expression with the characters eyes rolling back, mouth open, and their tongue is lolling out. Usually but not always sexual.
short_description: O-face.

name: crotchboobs
short_description: Breasts in the crotch area.

name: offscreen character
description:
A character that is either mentioned to and appears outside the image, or is partially visible in the image, but the full body or face is out of frame. Often applied to explicit images where certain body parts are connected to an offscreen body.

Example:
>>727897t
short_description: A character that is fully or partially off the image.

name: solo futa
description: A female, but with a penis; _counts as its own gender for gender-based tags._ This tag does not apply to ’safe’ rating images, please just use ’solo’ for those.
short_description: A single futa presented in a provocative or sexual manner

name: bust
description:
An image of the upper body of the character, no lower than the navel.

>>579261t
short_description: Above the navel.

name: species swap
description:
Also tag the species that the character is swapped to, such as changeling, dragon, zebra, spider, etc. Other tags may also apply, such as "zebrafied,":/tags/zebrafied "dragonified,":/tags/dragonified "cowified,":/tags/cowified or "changelingified.":/tags/changelingified
For swaps to another pony type, such as earth pony to alicorn, pegasus, unicorn, or bat pony, use "_race swap_":/tags/race+swap instead.
short_description: A character changed into another species entirely, such as a pony to dragon.
